CustomField.description:
After IT pings credit, they will send back a code to the Prospect record that indicates which next step the rep needs to take.
1 - Credit App is needed 2 - Bill To setup needed (NO LONGER USED) 3 - Ship To setup needed (NO LONGER USED) 4 - National account - must be handled by NAM team, send email to that box 5 - Other - Email generated to both Rep and the credit group mailbox containing all the details
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1 - Credit App is needed 4 - National account - must be handled by NAM team, send email to that box 5 - Other - Email generated to both Rep and the credit group mailbox containing all the details
CustomField.label: Credit - Action for Setup
